guide.introduction: The mini weed wacker is a fun thing to make.
guide.introduction_rendered: The mini weed wacker is a fun thing to make.
guide.summary: You will need a popsicle stick, AA battery, DC motor, wires and a round eraser. First you tape the battery and the motor to the stick. Then you tape the wire to the battery and stick the eraser to one side of the motor. Put the wires into the eraser.
guide.title: The mini weed wacker
